p: In the ABC analysis of the two IDU HIV-1 transmission chains among IDU we have assumed the same epidemiological model as in the simulations (stage-varying infectivity profile with ratio 10:1 acute:chronic, patient infectivity variation ( Ïƒ = 3)) and a sampling fraction of 50%. For the CRF01 IDU outbreak, the susceptible population was assumed to be 200 and in the Swedish subtype B ongoing epidemic it was set to 3000. Results are shown in Table 3.
